text:
e="preserve">Benny Chan Muk-Sing (; 7 October 1961 – 23 August 2020) was a Hong Kong movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was born in British Hong Kong. During the 1990s, he directed movies like "Big Bullet" (1996), "Who Am I?" (1998), and "Gen-X Cops" (1999).
In 2019, Chan was diagnosed with nasopharyngeal cancer. He died at a hospital in Hong Kong from the disease on 23 August 2020, aged 58.
